attributes.action: All key workers to be entitled to a 20% discount card.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that a show of appreciation for their continued hard work and dedication key workers should be entitled to a discount on goods and services. This will also help out key workers to pay for essentials themselves.
attributes.background: Offer a 20% discount card for use on multiple products and services by all key workers who worked during the coronavirus pandemic.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Discounts are a matter for individuals companies who choose to offer them.
